com.rbennett485.dawnoftheveg.model

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbennett485.dawnoftheveg.model.Level
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Level1, Level2, Level3, Level4, Level5, Level6, Level7, Level8

    public abstract class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the data which defines a level - the waypoints for the enemies, the positions of the tower patches, and the waves of enemies
    Author:
    Bennett_Richard
